data.title: Viking Acquisition Corp. I sets IPO price at $200M for public offering.
data.description: The number of confirmed cases of COVID-19 has reached 2 million worldwide, with total deaths surpassing 130,000. In the United States alone, there have been over 600,000 cases and more than 25,000 deaths. Italy has recorded over 150,000 cases and 20,000 deaths, while Spain has reported over 170,000 cases and 18,000 deaths. The pandemic has severely impacted economies, with global markets experiencing significant losses and unemployment numbers skyrocketing. Governments around the world continue to implement strict measures to control the spread of the virus, including lockdowns and social distancing guidelines.
US equities fall as weakness in Meta and Microsoft fuels concerns over Federal Reserve policy.

data.title: Divesting Jem office by 12 Nov 2025, expecting a gain of S$8.9 million on disposal for resilient growth.
data.description: The sale of the Jem office is set to finalize by November 12, 2025, with an estimated gain of approximately S$8.9 million from the disposal.
South Korea’s President highlights that alterations in free trade arrangements are affecting investment growth.

South Korea’s President emphasizes that nations must collaborate for mutual benefits, even if not always aligned.

data.title: Dr. Pei-Zen Chang is the new President of ITRI. Emphasizes innovation in his inaugural address.
data.description: In Taipei on October 31, 2025, the Industrial Technology Research Institute (ITRI) revealed Dr. Pei-Zen Chang as its new President. Dr. Chang highlighted in his opening speech that innovation is pivotal to Taiwan's industrial advancement. The appointment of Dr. Chang signifies a new direction for ITRI as it aims to uphold its reputation in the industry.

data.title: Bentley Systems reveals winners of 2025 Partner Excellence Awards in Berlin, honoring outstanding performance.
data.description: In Berlin, Bentley Systems revealed the recipients of its 2025 Partner Excellence Awards, recognizing outstanding achievements in product sales, services, and training.

data.title: Tile Shop Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: TTSH) to report Q3 2025 financial results on Nov 4, no conference call to be hosted.
data.description: Tile Shop Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: TTSH) disclosed that they will unveil their financial outcomes for Q3 ending on September 30, 2025, on Tuesday, November 4, 2025, post closure of financial markets. This specialty retailer dealing in natural stone, man-made, and luxury vinyl tiles, as well as setting and maintenance materials along with related accessories, declared they will not conduct a conference call alongside this announcement.
